full_summary:
---

# Employment Opportunity Announcement

## Title:

**5P204-230167 - Provision of Firewood - Forillon National Park**

## Solicitation Number:
WS4422682190

## Request for Proposal:

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified suppliers to submit proposals for the provision of firewood to the Forillon National Park in Gaspésie, Quebec.

### Description of Requirements

The request includes the acquisition and delivery of firewood as described in Annex Requirement. The successful supplier shall deliver the required quantities of firewood to the specified location.

### Specifications

* UNSPSC Code: *11121603
* UNSPSC Description: *Logs
* Categories of Prohibited Goods: None

### Notice Requirement

* Type: Request for Proposal
* Method of Procurement: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

### Contact Information

* Contractor's Name: Langis, Sonia (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contractor's Email: sonia.langis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Submission Information

Please refer to the request for proposal document available on the government procurement website for further details and submission instructions.

---
